mapper.sql: id as id ,chain as chain ,version as version ,order_id as order_id ,type_ as type_ ,price as price ,maker as maker ,ask_token as ask_token ,ask_amount as ask_amount ,bidder as bidder ,bid_token as bid_token ,bid_amount as bid_amount ,ts as ts ,dead_ts as dead_ts ,trade_status as trade_status ,is_enabled as is_enabled
